availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a farmer in Mercer County. Owned three slaves in 1860.

Spouse: Margaret Crutcher
Children: Thomas E Crutcher, Peter P Crutcher, Amanda Crutcher, Kate Crutcher, Bettie Crutcher, Sarah Crutcher

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, pages 68-69.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, page 20.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, James P Crutcher, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=35167849&ref=acom accessed 03/13/2017.
